DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine combination enzastaurin pemetrexed extend survival time without progression disease patient advance metastatic non-small cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Study Enzastaurin Versus Placebo With Pemetrexed Patients With Advanced Metastatic Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Laboratory confirm diagnosis NSCLC locally advance metastatic disease cure . Patients must disease progress 1 prior systemic cytotoxic chemotherapy regimen advance disease . At least 1 measurable lesion . Must stop previous systemic therapy cancer least 2 week prior enrollment . Must able follow study guideline able show appointment . Treatment within last 30 day drug receive regulatory approval indication time study entry . Previous treatment enzastaurin pemetrexed . Concurrent administration antitumor therapy . Inability swallow tablet Pregnant breastfeeding
